alert.note: Alert for Morton (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 01 at 10:32PM CDT until August 02 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL MORTON COUNTY... At 1032 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles south of Hannover to near New Salem to 5 miles northeast of Almont, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Morton County, including the following locations... Fish Creek Dam, Sweet Briar Lake, Judson and Crown Butte Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
